text: Uhulumeni ukhiphe isitatimende mayelana nezinsolo zokukhwabanisa ezithinta izikhulu zikahulumeni esifundazweni. Uphenyo seluqalile ngenhloso yokubhekana nezindaba zokungathembeki okuhlobene nokusetshenziswa budedengu kwezimali zomphakathi. Uhulumeni uzibophezele ekuqhubekeni nobulungiswa nangokulwisana nenkohlakalo ezindaweni zonke.

Izindawo zasemakhaya zithole umoya omusha wokuthuthukiswa komnotho ngenxa yemizamo kahulumeni yokutshalwa kwezimali ezinqubweni zomnotho ezisekelwe emphakathini. Imboni yokolimo, ezobuchwepheshe, kanye nezamabhizinisi amancane zikhula kakhulu, kudalwa amathuba emisebenzi entsha. Uhulumeni ukhuthaza intsha ukuthi ithathe ingxenye kulezi zinhlelo zokuthuthukiswa.

Ukuthuthukiswa komphakathi kudinga ukubambisana phakathi kwabantu, uhulumeni, nezinkampani. Izinselelo ezinjengokuntuleka kwezimali, ukufinyelela ezinsizeni, kanye nokungabi khona kolwazi olwanele zenza kube nzima ukuthuthuka. Izixazululo zingahlanganisa ukufundisana, ukwakha amandla omphakathi, kanye nokuhlela imihlangano ejwayelekile yokubonisana.

Amathuba emisebenzi entsheni atholakala emkhakheni wezobuchwepheshe, ezolimo, kanye nezamabhizinisi amancane. Uhulumeni kanye nezikhungo zemfundo bahlela izinhlelo zokuthuthukisa amakhono afana nokusebenza ngamakhompiyutha, ukwenza amabhizinisi, kanye nokuqeqeshwa kwezandla. Intsha iyakhuthazwa ukuba ibambe iqhaza futhi isebenzise lezi zinhlelo.

Izinhlelo zokugqugquzela amandla abesifazane ezindaweni zasemakhaya zihamba phambili ekuqinisekiseni ukuthuthuka kwezenhlalo nomnotho. Izinhlelo zokufundisa abesifazane, izimali zokuthuthukisa amabhizinisi amancane, kanye nezinhlangano ezisekela amalungelo abo ziye zaba yinzuzo enkulu emphakathini. Abesifazane bayakhuthazwa ukuba babe neqhaza elikhulu ekwakheni ikusasa eliqhakazile.

Izindlela zokuphila eziphilayo emphakathini zifaka phakathi ukusebenzisa imifino emisha, ukuzivocavoca, ukugwema utshwala, kanye nokuhlola impilo njalo. Amakhosi, izibhedlela zomphakathi, kanye nabefundisi bayabambisana ukugqugquzela impilo enhle. Ukuhlonipha umzimba nomoya kuwumgogodla wezindlela zempilo eziphilayo.

Ulwazi lwendabuko luyigugu okufanele lugcinwe ukuze izizukulwane ezizayo zithole isisekelo senhlonipho, ulimi, namasiko. Ukufundisa ulimi lwasekhaya ezikoleni, ukusebenzisa ulimi lwesiZulu kumakhasi ezinkundla zokuxhumana, kanye nokukhuthaza izingane ukuthi zikhulume izilimi zomdabu yizindlela ezisemqoka zokuligcina.

ISAZISO ESISEMTHETHWENI: Kubizwa wonke amalungu omphakathi ukuthi ahambele umhlangano ozobanjwa ngoLwesithathu, zingama-19 kuNhlangulana ngo-14:00 eHholo Lomphakathi. Izindaba ezizoxoxwa zihlanganisa ukuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda, ukuphepha, kanye nezinhlelo zokusekela intsha.

ISAZISO SIKAHULUMENI: Sazisa umphakathi ukuthi indawo yokugeza yomphakathi izovalwa kusukela zingama-15 kuNhlangulana ngenxa yokulungiswa kwezinsiza. Ukuvulwa kabusha kulindeleke ukuthi kube zingama-22. Siyaxolisa ngalesi siphazamiso.

1. Inkinga: Igeyimu ayivuli
   - Isixazululo: Qinisekisa ukuthi uhlelo lufakwe kahle, bese uqala kabusha idivayisi.
2. Inkinga: Ayikho inethiwekhi
   - Isixazululo: Hlola izilungiselelo zenethiwekhi noma usondele endaweni enensimbi engcono.

Uhulumeni wesifundazwe usungule izinhlelo zokunakekela impilo emphakathini ezihlanganisa imikhankaso yokugoma, izinsiza zokwelapha mahhala, kanye nezifundo zokuziphatha kahle kwezempilo. Lokhu kuhloswe ngakho ukunciphisa izifo ezingamahlalakhona nezithathelwana, futhi kugqugquzelwe impilo enhle kuwo wonke amazinga omphakathi.

Uhulumeni ukhiphe isinqumo sokulungisa inqubomgomo yezemfundo ezikoleni zomphakathi, ngokugxila ekukhuleni kwekhwalithi yokufunda, ukufundisa ngolimi lwasekhaya ezingeni lokuqala, kanye nokwandisa ukufinyelela kwezinsiza zokufundisa. Lolu shintsho luhloswe ngalo ukwakha isisekelo esiqinile semfundo yezingane.

KwaZulu-Natal kuyakhiwa imigwaqo emisha, izibhedlela, kanye nezikhungo zemfundo njengengxenye yephrojekthi yezokuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda. Lokhu kubhekelela izidingo zomphakathi, kuthuthukisa ukuhamba, nokudala amathuba emisebenzi. Uhulumeni uhlanganyela nabalingani bakwamanye amazwe ukuqinisekisa ukusebenza kahle kwezinhlelo.

Umkhosi wesintu wokweshwama ubalulekile emphakathini wakwaZulu. Lona ngumkhosi obungazwa ekupheleni kwesivuno, lapho amakhosi, izinduna, kanye nomphakathi beya edwendweni beyobonga izulu ngesivuno esihle. Iqukethe ukudla kwendabuko, imidlalo yesintu, izinkulumo, nokuhlaba inkomo njengesiko lokuhlonipha amadlozi.

Ezolimo zendabuko zibandakanya ukutshala ngezikhathi zonyaka ezifanele, ukusebenzisa izitshalo ezikhethekile ezifana nobhatata, umoba, kanye namabele. Abalimi basebenzisa izinkomba zemvelo njengokushintsha kwesimo sezulu ukubikezela isikhathi sokutshala. Lokhu kusiza ukugcina imvelo futhi kuqinisekise ukudla okwanele.

Indaba kaSipho, umfana waseMzimkhulu, ibonisa indlela ubuntu obwakha ngayo imiphakathi eqinile. Wabona umakhelwane edinga usizo, wanikela ngesikhathi sakhe ngaphandle kokufuna umvuzo. Umphakathi wakhe wawubonisa ukubonga ngokubambisana, kubonisa ukuthi 'umuntu ngumuntu ngabantu' â€“ igugu lethu lamaZulu.

Izandla zakwaZulu ziphila ngemisebenzi yobuciko obufana nokuluka imiqulu, ukupheka izitsha zobumba, nokweluka izingubo. Lobu buciko abugcini ngokunikeza abenzi imali kuphela, kodwa buphethe nenkulumo yezindaba, imvelaphi, nezifundiso ezibalulekile zamasiko esintu.

Umculo wesintu nowokudansa kubalulekile emphakathini wakwaZulu. Imigido efana neIndlamu isetshenziswa emikhosini njengokwendiswa, ukukhuliswa kwezingane, noma ukuhalalisela. Umculo ungumthombo wokudlulisa umlayezo, ukugqugquzela umoya wobumbano, kanye nokugcina umlando wethu ungenazihibe.

Sawubona mntwana! Namuhla sizofunda ngokubala: Uma unezithelo ezingu-3 uthe wathola ezingu-2 eziningi, unezingaki zonke? Phendula: 3 + 2 = 5. Ukubala kusiza ekuphileni kwansuku zonke â€“ esikoleni, ekhaya nasezitolo!

Ukuvikela imvelo kubalulekile ekusindiseni impilo yethu. Kufanele sigcine amanzi, singaphonsi udoti emifuleni, futhi sitshale izihlahla. Abantwana bangafunda ukuqoqa kabusha, ukusebenzisa izinto kabusha, nokuba abavikeli bemvelo ekhaya nasemphakathini.

Ukufunda ukusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe kubalulekile. Abadala bangafunda ukuvula ikhompyutha, ukusebenzisa i-inthanethi, kanye nokusebenzisa amafoni ukuhlangana nemindeni. Izifundo zedijithali zisiza abadala ukuthi bahlale bexhumekile, bafunde izinto ezintsha, futhi bathole izinsizakalo zikahulumeni online.

Uhulumeni ukhiphe isitatimende esiqinile mayelana nezinsolo zenkohlakalo ezibandakanya abanye abasebenzi bakahulumeni. UMnyango Wezokuphathwa Kwezomnotho uthe kuvulwe uphenyo olubanzi ukulandelela izinsolo zokusetshenziswa kabi kwezimali zomphakathi. Uhulumeni uzibophezele ekwakheni ubuholi obunobuqotho futhi uthe izinyathelo eziqinile zizothathwa uma kutholakala ubuqiniso.

Emizamweni yokukhuthaza intuthuko yezomnotho ezindaweni zasemakhaya, uhulumeni weSifundazwe waKwaZulu-Natal wethule uhlelo olusha oluhlose ukweseka osomabhizinisi abancane ngokuhlinzeka ngemishini, ukuqeqeshwa kanye nokufinyelela ezimakethe. Le projekthi iqale eMahlabathini futhi ihlose ukudala amathuba emisebenzi kubantu bendawo.

Ezingxoxweni zomphakathi eNanda, kuvele inselelo eziningi ezibhekene nomphakathi ekuthuthukiseni indawo. Lezi zifaka ukungabi khona kwezinsiza ezifanele, ukushoda kwemisebenzi, kanye nokwehluleka kwabaqondisi bezinhlelo. Izisombululo eziphakanyisiwe zifaka ukubambisana phakathi kukahulumeni, abahlali, kanye nosomabhizinisi ukuze kwakhiwe izinhlelo zokuzimela komphakathi.

Uhlelo olusha lwe-Youth Skills Advancement Program luqale eThekwini ngenhloso yokunika intsha amakhono afunekayo emnothweni wanamuhla. Lolu hlelo lubandakanya ukuqeqeshwa kwezobuchwepheshe, ukuphathwa kwamabhizinisi, kanye nokuqonda izimakethe zomsebenzi. Uhulumeni ukhuthaza intsha ukuba ibhalisele ukuze isizakale.

KwiSifundazwe saKwaZulu-Natal, imizamo yokugqugquzela amandla abesifazane emiphakathini yasemakhaya iyaqhubeka. Uhlelo lukaMasibambisane Women Empowerment Initiative luhlinzeka abesifazane ngamakhono okuqalisa amabhizinisi, uxhaso lwezezimali, nokuqeqeshwa kwezobuchwepheshe. Abesifazane abaningi sebeqale izinkampani ezincane futhi bazuza ukuzimela kwezezimali.

Uphiko lwezempilo luhambela imiphakathi yasemakhaya ukufundisa abantu ngezindlela zokugcina impilo enhle. Lokhu kufaka ukuqwashisa ngokuqwashisa nokuqapha izifo, ukondleka kahle, ukuqeqeshwa ngezindlela zokuhlanza amanzi, kanye nezindlela zokuzivocavoca. Umphakathi uyakhuthazwa ukuba ube nesandla ekugcineni impilo yomphakathi.

Ulwazi lwemvelo lwesintu lubalulekile ekugcineni ulimi lwesiZulu. Ulimi luhlobene ngokuqinile namasiko, umlando, nemigubho. Ukuhlonipha nokusetshenziswa kolimi lwesiZulu emakhaya, ezikoleni, nasemsebenzini kuyisinyathelo sokuqala sokuvikela ubunikazi besizwe.

Isaziso Esisemthethweni: Kubizwa umhlangano womphakathi ozoba mhla ziyi-20 kuNhlangulana 2025 eHholo leSonto laseMpumalanga ngelesi-10 ekuseni. Indaba ezobe ixoxwa yile ndlela yokwabiwa kwezimali zomphakathi nezinselelo zentuthuko. Bonke abahlali bayamenywa.

Isaziso: Sazisa umphakathi waseMlazi ukuthi umgodi wamanzi amasha uzovulwa ngesonto elizayo. Le nsiza izothuthukisa ukufinyelela kwamanzi ahlanzekile. Siyacela ukubekezela ngesikhathi kuqhubeka umsebenzi. Noma imiphi imibuzo ingabhekiswa kwiHhovisi loMasipala.

ðŸ”§ Isixazululo: Qinisekisa ukuthi sikhokhelwe kahle; hlola ikhebuli noma shintsha ipulaki. Uma inkinga iqhubeka, thintana nesevisi enguchwepheshe.

UMnyango Wezempilo wethule uhlelo lwe-Primary Healthcare Outreach eMkhambathini. Lolu hlelo luhlose ukuletha izinsiza zokwelapha ezisemqoka emphakathini, kufaka ukuhlolwa kwengcindezi yegazi, isifo sikashukela, kanye nokuhlolwa kwamazinyo. Abahlali bayakhuthazwa ukuba bazisebenzise lezi zinsiza ezisendaweni yabo.

UMnyango Wezemfundo umemezele izinguquko emgudwini wokufundisa izifundo zobuchwepheshe ezikoleni zamabanga aphezulu. Izifundo ezinjenge-Robotics, Coding, kanye ne-Entrepreneurship sezizoba yingxenye yemfundo eyisisekelo. Lolu shintsho luhlose ukulungiselela abafundi ngekhono lemisebenzi yakusasa.

Uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal wethule iphrojekthi entsha yokwakha imigwaqo emisha eNkandla naseMsinga. Le mboni izosiza ukuthuthukisa ukuthuthwa kwezimpahla, ukufinyelela ezikoleni nezibhedlela, futhi ikhexe amathuba emisebenzi emphakathini.

Umkhosi kaNomkhubulwane ubungazwa eNquthu ngesonto eledlule. Abesifazane bagqoke izingubo zomdabu, kwaba nemidlalo, izinkulumo nezinkonzo zokubonga uNomkhubulwane ngempilo nomhlaba. Lo mkhosi ukhombisa ukuhlonishwa kwezinsika zamasiko nezinkolo zabantu.

Izindlela zokulima zendabuko kubalwa ukulima ngamakhefu (crop rotation), ukusebenzisa umquba wemvelo, nokugcina imbewu. Izikhathi zokulima zihambisana nezikhathi zemvula. Abalimi bendabuko bahlonipha imvelo futhi basebenzisa ulwazi oludluliselwa ngamadlozi.

Emlandweni wesintu, ubuntu kusho ubumbano, ukuhlonipha, nokwabelana. Kwesinye isigameko eMsinga, abantu beluleka intsha ngokubaluleka kokusizana. Abantu badla ndawonye, basebenzisana, futhi basiza omakhelwane babo ngaphandle kokulindela umvuzo.

Ubuciko bendabuko besiZulu bufaka imisebenzi yezandla njengokweluka, ukufekethisa, nobuhlalu. Le misebenzi ayigcini nje ngokunikeza imali emphakathini kodwa futhi idlulisa umlando namasiko esizukulwaneni esilandelayo.
Umculo nomdanso wesiZulu ubalulekile esikweni. Izibonelo zifaka i-Indlamu, eyenziwa ngesikhathi somkhosi, nomculo wezingoma zomshado. Lezi zenzo zisiza ukukhulisa ubumbano nokwazisa amagugu esintu.

Ukuvikela imvelo kusho ukugcina izihlahla, ukungadoti emifuleni, nokusebenzisa kabusha izinto ezifana nepulasitiki. Qala ekhaya: lungisa amanzi angachitheki, uhlukanise udoti, futhi ufundise abanye ngenhlonipho yemvelo.

I-Digital Literacy Guide: Uma ufuna ukufunda ukusebenzisa ikhompyutha, qala ngezinye izinto eziyisisekelo njengokuvula i-laptop, ukusebenzisa ikhibhodi, nokuvula iphephandaba ku-inthanethi. Qinisekisa ukuthi uyakwazi ukuphatha igama-mfihlo futhi uvikele imininingwane yakho.

Uhulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika usola izenzo zokukhwabanisa ezenzakalayo eminyangweni kahulumeni nasemphakathini. Usola lo mkhuba wokugembula ngemali kahulumeni, okuholela ekulimaleni kwezinsiza zomphakathi. Uhulumeni uthembisa ukuletha izinqubo eziqinile zokulwisana nenkohlakalo, kusetshenziswa iHawks neNPA ukuhlonza nokuqumba amacala alabo abathintekayo.

Izinhlelo zentuthuko yomnotho emazweni asemaphandleni seziqalile ukuzala izithelo. Uhulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika ubambisene nezinhlangano zomphakathi ukuqala amabhizinisi amancane, ezolimo nezobuchwepheshe ezandleni zabantu basemakhaya. Lokhu kuhloswe ngakho ukwakha amathuba emisebenzi nokuqinisa umnotho wendawo.

Ekuhlangabezaneni nezinselele zomphakathi, izakhamuzi zikhuluma ngobunzima bokungabi namanzi, ukungabi nemisebenzi kanye nezinsiza zokwelapha. Imiphakathi iphakamisa izixazululo ezifana nokusebenza ngokubambisana nezinhlangano ezizimele, ukuqeqesha intsha, kanye nokuvula amathuba ezolimo ukuze kuhlangatshezwane nalezi zinselele.

Intsha inethuba lokuzithuthukisa ngokubamba iqhaza ezinhlelweni zokuthuthukisa amakhono. Uhulumeni nezinhlangano ezizimele zihlinzeka ngemifundaze, ama-workshop kanye nezinhlelo ze-internship ezihloswe ngazo ukunikeza intsha ulwazi nolwazi oludingekayo ukuze bathole imisebenzi.

Abesifazane basemakhaya bathola amandla ngokuthuthukiswa kwezimali nokufinyelela ezinhlelweni zokuqeqeshwa kwamabhizinisi amancane. Uhulumeni uxhase izinhlelo eziningi zokukhuthaza abesifazane ukuba babe ngabaholi emphakathini futhi bazinikele ekuqedeni ubumpofu ezindaweni zabo.

Imiphakathi yamaZulu iyagqugquzela impilo enhle ngokusebenzisa izindlela zendabuko ezifana nokwelashwa ngezitshalo, ukudla okunempilo, kanye nokuzivocavoca. Ukubambisana nezinhlaka zezempilo zomphakathi kwenza kube lula ukufinyelela izinsiza zokwelashwa nezokugoma ezisemqoka.

Ukwelondolozwa kwezilimi zomdabu kubalulekile ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi amasiko ayaphila futhi ayakhula. Ulwazi lwesiZulu kufanele lufundiswe ezikoleni, kwenziwe izinhlelo zokufunda ngolimi lwendabuko, kanti izinhlelo zethelevishini nezomsakazo ziyasiza ekugcineni ulimi luphila.

ISigungu seNkosi uDlamini sithumele isimemo esisemthethweni kubo bonke abahlali ukuba babe yingxenye yomhlangano womphakathi ozoba mhla zi-25 kuNhlangulana 2025 eHholo Lomphakathi ngo-10 ekuseni. Izindaba ezizoxoxwa zihlanganisa izindaba zokuphepha, intuthuko kanye nezidingo zomphakathi.

ISigungu sikaMasipala iMfolozi sibhalela lesi saziso kubahlali, sibazisa ukuthi izinsiza zomphakathi ezifana namanzi, ugesi kanye nezikhungo zezempilo zizotholakala ngezikhathi ezichaziwe ngenxa yomsebenzi wokulungiswa. Sicela ukubekezela phakathi kwalesi sikhathi.

**Izinkinga Ezivamile Nokuxazulula**:
1. **Amanzi angaphephile**: Sebenzisa izifutho noma ubilise amanzi ngaphambi kokuwasebenzisa.
2. **Ugesi uphela njalo**: Thintana noMasipala noma sebenzisa ama-generator noma ama-solar.
3. **I-WiFi ayisebenzi**: Qinisekisa ukuthi idivayisi ixhunywe kahle, zama uku-restart-a i-router.
4. **Izimpahla zomphakathi zilimele**: Bika kumasipala ngokushesha.

Izinhlelo zokunakekelwa kwempilo zisavela njalo eNingizimu Afrika. Uhulumeni, ngokuqonda izidingo zomphakathi, uqale amaphrojekthi asebenzayo afana nezikhungo zezempilo ezihambayo, imikhankaso yokugoma kanye nezifundo zokuqwashisa nge-HIV/AIDS. Lolu hlelo luhlose ukufinyelela kuwo wonke umuntu, ikakhulukazi emazweni asemaphandleni.

UMnyango Wezemfundo ushicilele izinguquko ezintsha kuhlelo lwezemfundo. Kugcizelelwe ukufundisa imfundo yezobuchwepheshe ezikoleni, ukufaka iCoding neRobotics kusukela ebangeni le-4, kanye nokuvuselela izinhlelo zokuhlola ukuze zifanele izidingo zanamuhla zezeMfundo.

Uhulumeni waseKwaZulu-Natal usungule imisebenzi yokwakhiwa kwemigwaqo, izikole kanye nezibhedlela kuleli zwe. Izinhlelo ezifana noKZN Infrastructure Plan 2025 zihlose ukuvuselela ingqalasizinda futhi kudaleke amathuba emisebenzi kwabantu bendawo.

Umkhosi wokweshwa, owaziwa ngokuthi i-Umemulo, uyisiko elihlonishwayo emphakathini wamaZulu. Intombi esezingeni lokushada inikwa izipho, igezwa ngamanzi anamakha, igezwa ubuso ngobisi, futhi ithwele izimpahla zobuhlalu. Lo mkhosi ukhombisa ukuhlonipha, ukuvuthwa kanye nokuzimisela kobuntombi.

Abantu bakaZulu basebenzisa izindlela zendabuko ezifana nokutshala ngokwezikhathi zonyaka. Ehlobo kutshalwa imifino, kanti ebusika kugcinwa izitshalo eziyizimpande. Izinsiza ezifana nobulongwe benkomo zisetshenziswa njengesibulala-zinambuzane nemanyolo.

Indaba kaSibongiseni, owasiza umakhelwane wakhe ngaphandle kokulindela mbuyiselo, iyisibonelo esiphelele se-ubuntu. Umphakathi waseMahlabathini uhlanganisa imfundo, usizo lwesintu nokuhlanganyela ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi akekho oshiywa ngaphandle.

Ubuciko bendabuko bukaZulu bufaka phakathi ubuhlalu, ukufekethisa, nezitsha ezenziwe ngesandla. Le midlalo ayigcini nje ngokuba ubuhle obubonakalayo, kodwa igcina umlando, isiko kanye nemvelaphi yomndeni.
Umculo wendabuko wamaZulu uhlanganisa isigubhu, ukucula kwamadlozi, nokugida kwendabuko. Izigigaba ezifana ne-Umzansi Zulu Dancers zibonisa ubuhle besintu futhi zidala umoya wokuzigqaja ngokwamasiko.

**Amasu Ezibalo Abantwana**:
1. Ukubala kusuka ku-1 kuye ku-10 usebenzisa iminwe.
2. Ukuhlukanisa izinto eziningi zibe yizinhlaka.
3. Ukusebenzisa izithombe ukufundisa izibalo ezifana nokungeza nokususa.
4. Ukufunda ngezinombolo nsuku zonke ngemidlalo efana 'Amagilebhisi'.

Ukuvikelwa kwemvelo kudinga ukufundisa izingane ukubaluleka kokuhlanzeka, ukusebenzisa kabusha izinto, nokutshala izihlahla. Izingane zingaba yinxenye yemikhankaso yendawo yokuhlanza, ukufunda ngezilwane zasendle kanye nokusebenzisa amanzi ngendlela efanele.

Ukufunda ubuchwepheshe bekhompyutha kungaba lula kubantu abadala uma kuhloswe ngendlela efanele. Qala ngokufunda ukusebenzisa imishini (keyboard, mouse), bese uya kuhlelo lokusebenza lwe-imeyili, ukusesha ulwazi nge-inthanethi, nokusebenzisa izinhlelo zokusebenza ezifana neWhatsApp neZoom zokuxhumana.

UHulumeni uhlala ezibophezele ekulweni nenkohlakalo. Izikhungo ezahlukahlukene zihlangene ukuqinisekisa ukuthi labo abatholakala benkohlakalo babhekana nomthetho. Siyazi ukuthi inkohlakalo ilimaza kakhulu intuthuko yezwe kanye nezimpilo zabantu bakithi. Izinhlelo ezintsha ziqaliswe ukwenza kube lula ukubika izigameko zenkohlakalo nokuvikela abazibikezayo. Sifisa ukuthi umphakathi usisize kulo mzabalazo ngokubambisana nathi. Sizophinde siqhubeke nokufundisa umphakathi ngemiphumela emibi yenkohlakalo. Inkohlakalo ngeke ivunyelwe ukuba igcine idedelela ezweni lethu.

Ukuthuthukiswa komnotho emiphakathini yasemakhaya kuseqhulwini kuhulumeni. Izinhlelo eziningi ziqaliswe ukuqinisa amabhizinisi amancane naphakathi nendawo, ukudala amathuba emisebenzi kanye nokuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda. Ukusatshalaliswa kwamandla kagesi, amanzi ahlanzekile, nemigwaqo engcono kuthuthukisa izimpilo zabantu futhi kudonsa abatshalizimali. Kubalulekile ukuthi imiphakathi yasemakhaya ibambe iqhaza ekuhleleni nasekuqaliseni lezi zinhlelo ukuze zihambisane nezidingo zabo. Siphinde sigxile ekuhlinzekeni ngokuqeqeshwa kwamakhono okuzosiza abantu basekhaya ukuthi bazakhele amathuba emisebenzi.

Izingqinamba nezixazululo zentuthuko yomphakathi: Umphakathi ubhekana nezinselelo eziningi njengokuntuleka kwamanzi ahlanzekile, ingqalasizinda engekho ngokwanele, kanye nokuntuleka kwamathuba emisebenzi. Ezinye zezixazululo zihlanganisa ukubambisana phakathi kukahulumeni nomphakathi, ukugqugquzela ukusungulwa kwamabhizinisi amancane, kanye nokuqinisa imfundo. Kubalulekile ukuthi umphakathi uhlanganyele ekuhleleni nasekuqaliseni izinhlelo zentuthuko. Abaholi bomphakathi kufanele babe ngabokuqala ekusebenziseni izixazululo ezintsha. Siphinde sigxile ekugqugquzeleni ukusimama kwezomnotho nokuvikelwa kwemvelo.

Amathuba emisebenzi yentsha nokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono: Intsha yethu iyikusasa lezwe, ngakho-ke kubalulekile ukuthi ihlonyiswe ngamakhono adingekayo ukuze ikwazi ukuncintisana emkhakheni wemisebenzi. Izinhlelo ezahlukene zokuqeqesha nokuphumelela ziyaqhubeka ukuhlinzeka intsha ngamakhono. Lezi zinhlelo zihlanganisa ukuqeqeshwa kobuchwepheshe, amakhono okuxhumana, kanye nokuqeqeshwa kwamabhizinisi. Sihlose ukunciphisa ukungasebenzi kwentsha ngokuyihlinzeka ngamathuba okufunda nokuthola ulwazi olusha. Intsha kufanele izimisele ukufunda nokuthuthuka njalo.

Ukuhlonishwa kwamalungelo abesifazane emiphakathini yasemakhaya: Abesifazane yibona abahlabani ekuthuthukiseni imiphakathi yasemakhaya. Kubalulekile ukuthi babeswe amandla ngokugcwele, baqinisekiswe ukuthi banamathuba afanayo, futhi bavikelwe ekuhlukunyezweni. Izinhlelo zokuqinisa amabhizinisi abesifazane, ukubafundisa ngamalungelo abo, kanye nokubahlinzeka ngemisebenzi ziyaqhubeka. Sifisa ukuthi abesifazane babe nenkululeko ephelele yezomnotho nezenhlalo. Ukuba abesifazane bavikelwe futhi bahlonishwe kuqinisekisa ukuthuthuka okusimeme kwemiphakathi yonke.

Ezempilo nezindlela zokuphila ezinhle emiphakathini yesiZulu: Ukuba nempilo enhle kubalulekile empilweni yonke yomuntu. Emiphakathini yesiZulu, kunemikhuba eminingi emihle yezempilo efana nokudla okunempilo, ukuzivocavoca umzimba, kanye nokuhlala uhlanzekile. Kubalulekile ukuqhubeka nokufundisa umphakathi ngezifo ezivamile kanye nezindlela zokuzivikela kuzo. Ukufinyelela ezinsizakalweni zezempilo eziyisisekelo kubalulekile. Imitholampilo nezikhungo zezempilo kufanele zibe kalula ukufinyeleleka futhi zinikeze izinsiza ezisezingeni eliphezulu. Siphinde sigxile ekufundiseni umphakathi ngezifo ezingathathelani njengesifo sikashukela nomfutho wegazi.

Ukubaluleka kokulondoloza izilimi zomdabu: Ulimi luwumgogodla wesiko nobuntu. Kubalulekile ukuthi siyilondoloze futhi siyithuthukise isiZulu nezinye izilimi zomdabu ukuze zinganyamalali. Ukusebenzisa isiZulu ekhaya, esikoleni, nasemsebenzini kuyasiza ukugcina ulimi luphila. Izinhlelo zokuphromotha isiZulu emithonjeni yezindaba, ezincwadini, nasezinhlelweni zokufundisa ziyaqhubeka. Sifisa ukuthi izingane zifunde ukukhuluma isiZulu kahle kusukela zisencane. Ukuba nolwazi ngezilimi eziningi kucebisa umuntu futhi kumvulele amathuba amaningi.

IZINHLELO ZEZEMPILO ZIKAHULUMENI: UKUQINISA IMPILO YABANTU

UMnyango Wezempilo uzibophezele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika banokufinyelela ezinsizakalweni zezempilo ezisezingeni eliphezulu. Izinhlelo eziningi ziqaliswe ukuze kuqinisekiswe lokhu. Kubalulekile ukugxila ekunqandeni izifo ezingathathelani njengesifo sikashukela nomfutho wegazi ngokugqugquzela ukudla okunempilo nokuphila impilo esebenzayo. Siphinde sigxile ekuthuthukiseni izinsizakalo zezempilo emiphakathini yasemakhaya, siqinisekise ukuthi imitholampilo inemishini eyanele nabasebenzi abaqeqeshiwe. Ukugonywa kubalulekile ekulweni nezifo eziwumqedazwe, ngakho-ke siyakhuthaza wonke umuntu ukuthi agome. Ukubambisana phakathi kukahulumeni nomphakathi kubalulekile ekwakheni impilo engcono kuwo wonke umuntu.

IZIMPAWU EZINTSHA ENQUBOMGOMWENI YEZIMFUNDO: UKWAKHA IKUSASA ELINGCONO

UMnyango Wezemfundo uzibophezele ekuletheni uguquko oludingekayo emkhakheni wezemfundo ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi bonke abafundi bathola imfundo esezingeni eliphezulu. Izinguquko ezintsha zenqubomgomo zizogxila ekuthuthukiseni amakhono abafundi angaconsi phansi, ikakhulukazi emikhakheni yesayensi, ubuchwepheshe, ubunjiniyela, nezibalo (STEM). Kuzogxilwa kakhulu ekufundiseni ngesandla nangomlomo. Sizophinde siqinise uqeqesho lothisha ukuze bakwazi ukuhambisana nalezi zinguquko. Kubalulekile ukuthi abazali nomphakathi babambe iqhaza ekusebenziseni lezi zinguquko ukuze kuphumelele imfundo yezingane zethu. Sifisa ukuthi izikole zethu zibe izikhungo zokufunda eziqhakazile.

IZINHLELO ZOKUTHUTHUKISWA KWENGQALASIZINDA E-KWAZULU-NATAL

Isifundazwe saKwaZulu-Natal siyindawo yokukhula komnotho okuqhubekayo, futhi ukuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda kubalulekile ekusekeleni lokhu kukhula. Izinhlelo eziningi ezinkulu ziyaqhubeka kulesi sifundazwe. Lokhu kuhlanganisa ukwakhiwa kwemigwaqo emisha, ukuthuthukiswa kwamachweba, kanye nokwandiswa kwamandla kagesi. Ukwakhiwa komgwaqo omusha phakathi kweTheku neMgungundlovu kuzonciphisa isikhathi sokuhamba futhi kuthuthukise ukuthutha kwempahla. Ukwanda kwamandla kagesi kuzoheha abatshalizimali abasha futhi kudale amathuba emisebenzi. Lezi zinhlelo ziqinisekisa ukuthi iKwaZulu-Natal ihlala iyisango elibalulekile lezomnotho eNingizimu Afrika.

UMKHOSI WOMHLEHLO WESINTU WESIZULU: ISIQINISEKISO SESIKO NOBUNTU

Umkhosi Womhlehlo wesintu sikaZulu ungenye yemicimbi ebaluleke kakhulu esikweni lesiZulu. Lo mcimbi ugujwa njalo ngonyaka, lapho amantombazane angakagani eya eMhlangeni ukuze anikele ngezimbali kuMdlokombana. Lo mcimbi uyingxenye ebalulekile yokufundisa amantombazane ngamakhono obudala, inhlanzeko, nokuziphatha okuhle. Izintombi zigqoka izimpahla zendabuko ezimibalabala, zihlobise izinwele zazo ngezinsiba, futhi zicule izingoma zakudala. Ukushaywa kwesigubhu nokudansa kuyizinto ezibalulekile zalo mcimbi. Umhlehlo uphinde ukhombise ukuhlonishwa kwezinyanya nokubonga imvelo. Lo mcimbi ubalulekile ekulondolozeni isiko lesiZulu nokudlulisa ulwazi ezizukulwaneni ezizayo.

IZINDLELA ZENDABUKO ZOKULIMA NASEKUSEBENZENI NGAMASIZINI

Umlimi wendabuko ongumZulu wayencika kakhulu olwazini lwesizini kanye nezimpawu zemvelo. Ukulima kwenziwa ngendlela efanele ukugcina umhlabathi uvundile. Ukutshala kwakuvame ukwenzeka ngemuva kwezulu lokuqala elikhulu, lapho umhlabathi usuvundile. Izitshalo ezifana nombila, amabele, namathanga kwakuyizitshalo eziyinhloko. Ukujikeleza kwezitshalo kwakusetshenziswa ukugcina umhlabathi unempilo. Ukuvuna kwakwenziwa ngezandla, futhi imbewu yayigcinwa kahle ukuze isetshenziswe esikhathini esizayo. Umlimi wendabuko wayesebenzisa ulwazi lwezinkanyezi ukunquma isikhathi esifanele sokutshala nokuvuna. Ukulima kwakungesona nje isenzo sokukhiqiza ukudla, kodwa kwakuyindlela yokuphila futhi kuyingxenye ebalulekile yesiko lesiZulu.

INDABA YOBUNTU NEZIMISO ZOMPHAKATHI

Kwakukhona umzana omncane eceleni komfula, lapho abantu baphila khona ngokubambisana nangokuzwela. Babekholelwa emfundweni yobuntu, eyayithi umuntu ungumuntu ngabantu. Lokhu kwakusho ukuthi impumelelo yomuntu ngamunye yayincike empumelelweni yomphakathi wonke. Uma umuntu ehlupheka, wonke umphakathi wawuzizwa ubuhlungu. Babesizana ngezikhathi zokuvuna, zokwakha izindlu, nangezikhathi zokudabuka. Izingane zazifunda ukuhlonipha abadala nokubasiza. Uma kwakukhona ingxabano, abaholi babesiza ukuxazulula izinkinga ngendlela enobulungiswa. Lo mzana wawubonisa ukuthi ubuntu buwumthombo wamandla emphakathini futhi buletha injabulo yangempela.

UBUCIKO BENDABUKO BUKAZULU NOKUBALULEKA KWABO KWAMASIKO

Ubuciko bendabuko bukaZulu bucebile futhi bunemibala eminingi, okubonisa umlando ocebile kanye nesiko lalesi sizwe. Izinto zobuciko ezifana nobuhlalu, imiklamo yezindlu, izitsha zobumba, kanye nezimpahla zokugqoka zinenjongo ejulile emasikweni. Ubuhlalu, obugqokwa abesifazane nabesilisa, bunikeza imiyalezo ehlukahlukene ngobulili, isimo somshado, kanye nesimo senhlalo. Izindlu zendabuko, ezakhiwe ngotshani nodaka, zikhombisa ubuhlakani bokwakha kanye nokubambisana komphakathi. Izitsha zobumba zisetshenziselwa ukugcina ukudla namanzi, futhi zihlotshiswe ngemidwebo emihle. Lezi zinto zobuciko aziwona nje ubuciko, kodwa ziwumbhalo wempilo yesiZulu. Ukuzilondoloza kubalulekile ekudluliseni isiko ezizukulwaneni ezizayo.

UMCULO NOMDANSO WENDABUKO WESIZULU

Umculo nomdanso kuyingxenye ebalulekile yesiko lesiZulu. Umculo wesintu uvame ukwenziwa ngamathuluzi afana nezinsimbi zomculo, izigubhu, kanye namahubo. Umdanso wesintu uvame ukuhambisana nomculo, futhi iminyakazo inezincazelo ezahlukene. Umdanso weNdlamu, owenziwa abesilisa, ukhombisa amandla nobuqhawe. Umdanso wesiBhaca, owenziwa abesifazane, ukhombisa ubuhle nobuzwe. Umdanso ubalulekile emicimbini efana nemishado, imingcwabo, kanye nemikhosi. Umculo nomdanso akuwona nje ukuzijabulisa, kodwa yindlela yokuxhumana, ukugcina umlando, nokudlulisela isiko. Kubalulekile ukuthi lezi zinhlobo zobuciko zilondolozwe futhi ziqhubeke nokufundiswa ezizukulwaneni ezizayo.

UMBIKO WEZINDABA: Ukuthuthukiswa Komnotho Emakhaya Asemaphandleni

EMthatha, uhulumeni usungene ohlelweni olusha lokuthuthukisa umnotho emiphakathini yasemaphandleni. Lolu hlelo lubandakanya ukusekela amabhizinisi amancane, ukwakha izindlela zokudlulela, kanye nokunikeza ukuqeqeshwa kwezemisebenzi. Abakhi-mphakathi abasemaphandleni sebeveza ukuthi lena yindlela efanele yokusiza ukuthola amathuba emisebenzi. Imiphumela emihle isivele ibonakala emiphakathini eyisikhombisa lapho kuqaliswe khona lolu hlelo.

INKULUMO YOMPHAKATHI: Izinselelo Zokuthuthukisa Umphakathi Nezixazululo

Emhlanganweni womphakathi owawubanjelwe ngoLwesihlanu, abantu basekhaya baxoxe ngezinselelo ezibhekene nomphakathi wabo. Phakathi kwezinkinga ezibaliwe kubalwa ukuntuleka kwamanzi ahlanzekile, izindlela ezimbi, kanye nokuntuleka kwezindawo zemidlalo entsheni. Izixazululo eziphakanyiswe zifaka ukusebenzisana nomasipala, ukwakha amaqembu abantu basekhaya, kanye nokuqoqa imali yomphakathi. Bonke abantu basekhaya bavume ukuthi umsebenzi wokuthuthukisa kumele uqhutshwe ngokubambisana.

AMATHUBA EMISEBENZI ENTSHENI: Ukuthuthukiswa Kwamakhono

Umnyango wezamaSebenzi uchaze ukuthi uzoqalisa uhlelo olusha lokuthuthukisa amakhono entsheni. Lolu hlelo luzosiza intsha ukuthola amakhono okuqeqeshwa ezimayini, ekwakhiweni, kanye nokudla. Izindawo zokuqeqeshwa zizovulwa emadolobheni ayisishiyagalombili ezweni lonke. Intsha ezimiseleko ukuzibandakanya kuzona izinhlelo kumele ibhalisele ngaphambi komhla zingama-30 kuMashi. Lolu hlelo luhloswe ukuze kuncishiswe umsebenzi wentsha ezweni.

UKUQINISWA KWABESIFAZANE EMIPHAKATHINI YASEMAPHANDLENI

Amaqembu abesifazane emiphakathini yasemaphandleni asanda kuqalisa izinhlelo zokuzimela ngokwezomnotho. Lezi zinhlelo zibandakanya ukulima okuphezulu, ukusonga, kanye nokwenza izinto zokuhlobisa. Abesifazane abangaphezu kwamakhulu amabili sebethola ukusekela okwezimali ukuze baqalise amabhizinisi abo. Uhlelo lwabesifazane baseZumaville lubonise impumelelo enkulu, lapho imindeni eyisithupha isithole indlela yokuziphilisa kahle. Lokhu kufakazela amandla abesifazane ekuthuthukiseni umphakathi.

IMPILO YOMPHAKATHI NEZINQUBO ZOKUZIVIKELA

Emiphakathini yamaZulu, amasiko okuzikhusela empilweni asaqhubeka nokuba nesidlulisi. Ukusebenzisa amakhambi endabuko, ukudla okufanele, kanye nemikhuba yomzimba kubonakala kusasiza ekulweni nezifo. Abadala basemphakathini basafundisa intsha ngokusebenzisa ubulwane bendabuko, ubumfito, kanye nezinye izinhlobo zamakhambi. Izinhlelo zezempilo zikahulumeni sezisebenzisana nolwazi lwendabuko ukuze kuthuthukiswe impilo yabantu. Lokhu kubonisa ukubaluleka kokuhlanganisa izindlela zendabuko nezesimanje zokwelapha.

UKUBALULEKA KOKUVIKELA IZILIMI ZENDABUKO

IsiZulu njengokunye kwezilimi zase-Afrika kusengozini yokuphela uma singasikhuseli. Izilimi ziyisisekelo sesiko nokubaluleka komphakathi. Kumele simisele ukufundisa izilimi zendabuko esikoleni, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iziteshi zomsakazo zibeka izinhlelo ngezilimi zendabuko, kanye nokusekela ababhali ababhala ngezilimi zendabuko. Uma singasivikeli isiZulu sethu, sizoze silahlekelwe yisisekelo sesiko sethu. Wonke umuntu unesibopho sokulondoloza isiZulu sethu ukuze sizinze ezizukulwaneni ezizayo.

ISAZISO ESISEMTHETHWENI: Umhlangano Womphakathi

Sazisa bonke abantu basekhaya ukuthi kuzoba nomhlangano womphakathi ngoLwesihlanu umhla zine-15 kuMashi 2025 ngo-10:00 ekuseni. Umhlangano uzobanjwa eHolini yoMphakathi yaseNkandla. Indaba ezizoxoxwa phezu kwazo zibandakanya ukwakhiwa kwendlela entsha, isikole esisha, kanye nemisebenzi yomphakathi. Bonke abaphakeme eminyakeni engamashumi amabili nanye nangaphezulu bayakhuthazwa ukuba beze. Ukudla kuzotholakala. Imibuzo noma izinkinga zingathunyelwa ku-Nkosazana Dlamini, uMphathi woMphakathi.

ISAZISO ESISEMTHETHWENI: Izinsiza Zomphakathi

Sazisa umphakathi ukuthi isiteshi samanzi esisha sizovulwa eNkandla ngoLwesithathu. Amanzi azotholakala phakathi kuka-6:00 ekuseni no-6:00 ntambama. Bonke abadinga amanzi kumele babone i-ID yabo. Ubuningi bamanzi obungatholakala ngokhono olulodwa bubungu-50 amalitha. Isiteshi sazotholakala njalo ngesonto ngoLwesibili no-Lwesihlanu. Imibuzo ingathunyelwa kuMasipala waseNkandla noma ku-072 123 4567.

UMHLAHLANDLELA WOKUXAZULULA IZINKINGA: Izinkinga Ezijwayelekile Nasezindlini

Uma ugesi uyaphela: 1) Bheka uma amahola amanji avuliwe; 2) Bheka uma ama-switches asekhaya elokhu evuliwe; 3) Shayela i-Eskom ku-08600 37566. Uma amanzi aphela: 1) Bheka uma i-valve elokhu ivuliwe; 2) Bona umakhelwana uma nabo bengenayo; 3) Shayela umasipala ku-033 845 2000. Uma TV ayisebenzi: 1) Vala futhi uyivule; 2) Bheka uma ucingo lufakiwe kahle; 3) Shayela uMnet ku-135. Izinkinga zikagesi: Ungakwazi ukuzisombulula ngokwakho - shayela ugcwasa.

IZINHLELO ZEZEMPILO: Ukuthuthukiswa Kwezempilo Emiphakathini

Umnyango wezeMpilo uyaziqhenya ngokuchaza izinhlelo ezintsha zokuthuthukisa impilo emiphakathini. Izinhlelo zibandakanya ukukhiqiza amakliniki aseduze, ukuqeqeshwa kwabasebenzi bezempilo, kanye nokunikezwa kwamaketanga amahhala. Izinhlelo zihloswe ukufinyelela emiphakathini engcono ukuze kuthuthukiswe impilo yabantu. Abaguli abakudinga ukuze bazokwelashwa ngobuhlalu kufanele babhadale ukuze bathole ukwelashwa. Lezi zinhlelo zizobe zisebenza kusukela ngoMay 2025 kuze kube sekupheleni kuka-2025.

ISAZISO SIKAHULUMENI: Izinguquko Kwezemfundo

Umnyango wezeMfundo uyaziqhenya ngokuchaza izinguquko ezintsha kwisimiso semfundo. Kusukela ku-January 2025, zonke izikole zizobe zifundisa ngolimi lwasekhaya emabangeni aphansi kufika ku-Grade 3. Izilimi ziyoba isiZulu, isiXhosa, seSotho, kanye nezinye izilimi zaseAfrika. Lolu shintsho luhloswe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izingane zifunda kangcono. Izikole zizothola ukusekela okwengeziwe ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi izingane zifunda ngokwaneleyo. Lokhu kuzosiza ukuthuthukisa kakhulu impilo yabantwana base-Afrika.

UKWAKHIWA KWEZINGQALASIZINDA KWAZULU-NATAL

Uhulumeni waseKwaZulu-Natal uyaziqhenya ngokuchaza amaphrojekthi amakhulu okwakha izingqalasizinda ezweni. Amaphrojekthi aqondile ukwakha izindlela ezintsha, amabhuloho, kanye neziteshi zamanzi. Okuyinhloko, indlela eyisuka eDurban iya ePietermaritzburg izothuthukiswa ngokuphelele. Nakho isibhedlela esintsha eNkandla sizakhiwa. Lawa maphrojekthi azoletha amathuba emisebenzi angaphezu kwama-5000 abantu. Umsebenzi uzoqala ngo-April 2025 futhi uzophethwa ngo-2027.

UMKHOSI WOKUPHILA KOMDENI: Isiko Eliqotho LamaZulu

Umkhosi wokuphila komdeni uyisiko eliqotho kwamaZulu eliqhubeka nanamuhla. Lomkhosi wenziwa uma umfana eshona futhi esefuna ukukhongolose. Abadala bakhuluma nezinyanga ukuze bachaze ukuthi umfana usevuthiwe. Kuphinde kuhlatshwe inkomo ukuze kube nomsebenzi wokuphila. Umfana ugqoka izingubo zendabuko ezimhlophe futhi abantu bayacula. Umfana uyazikhonza kubo bonke abadala nomphakathi futhi ubonisa ukuthi uselwele ukuba indoda. Lesi siko siyachibiyela ukuthuthuka komfana futhi umphakathi uyamhlonipha.

AMASIKO OKULIMA WENDABUKO NAMAHLATHI EMVELO

Amasiko okulima wendabuko kwamaZulu ayachibiyela ukusebenzisana nemvelo. Phakathi kwasebusika, kwakulinywa umbila, amabele, kanye namazambane. Kwakulinywa ngokwemozulu futhi abalimi babesebenzisa izibalo zenyanga. Umhlaba wawucindezelwa ngokukhulisa inkomo ukuze umhlaba uthuthuke. Abalimi babe sebenzisa amandla emfuyo yokulima, hhayi imishini. Amakhambi abalimi babe sebenzisa wona ukuvikela imiaka. Lawa masiko ayachibiyela ukuphila okuhle nemvelo. Namuhla, abafundi bayafunda ukuze baphinde basebenzise lawa masiko.

UBUNTU: Isisekelo Sesiko Nomphakathi

Ubuntu luyisiko eliqotho kwamaZulu elithi 'umuntu ngumuntu ngabantu'. Lesi siko siyachibiyela ukuthi thina sonke siyahlobene futhi kumele sisizane. Uma umphakathi ubona umuntu osebuhlungwini, bonke kufanele bamsize. Lolu hlobo lwesiko luye lwabonakalisa ukuphila okuhle kwezizwe zase-Afrika. Ubuntu lubonisa ukuphila okuhle, ukwehla, ukusizana, nokuhlonipha abantu bonke. Abantu abadala baye bafundisa izingane ukuthi ziphile ngo-ubuntu. Namuhla, iningi labamehla baye benzimsebenzisa lesi siko ezimpilweni zabo.

UBUCIKO BENDABUKO BAMA-ZULU NOKUBALULEKA KWAMASIKO

Ubuciko bendabuko bama-Zulu buchaza ukwenza izinto ngobuhlakani. Obuciko obuqotho bubandakanya ukwenza izinkamba, amathanga, kanye nezinto zokuhlobisa. Abesifazane baye benza izinkamba ezisuka olwawini, futhi baye bazihlobisa ngokusebenzisa imibala ehlukahlukene. Amadoda aye enza izikali, amakhanda, kanye nezinto zokusebenzisa ekunqeni. Ubuciko obu buchaza ukwazi nokuhlakanipha kwabantu. Abantu abaye benza izinto lezi baye bazithengisa ukuze baziphilise. Ubuciko bendabuko buma-Zulu buyachibiyela ukuqhuba kwamasiko nezinkambiso zemvelo.

UMCULO NEMIDANSO YENDABUKO YAMA-ZULU

Umculo nemidanso yendabuko yama-Zulu kuyinto ebalulekile yesiko. Ukucula okuhle kufaka isizingili, amaxhosa, kanye nezindlu zokudanisa. Umculo ugqamile ngokusebenzisa amagwijo, izigubhu, kanye nezinto zokushaya. Abantu bayacula futhi badanse ngokwemisebenzi ehlukahlukene yamasiko. Imidanso esidlulisa amaqhega, ukuqhena, kanye nokunye. Amadoda aye egqoke izinkamba kanye nezimpahla zendabuko uma edansa. Abesifazane aye bajive izinkamba kanye nezimpahla zendabuko. Umculo nemidanso kubonisa ukuphila okuhle kwamasiko.

UKUFUNDA IZIBALO NEZIBALO ZENDABUKO NEZINGANE

Ukufunda izibalo kubalulekile ezinganeni. Siqala ngokufundisa ukubala kusuka ku-1 kuya ku-10. Izingane zifunda ukubala zisebenzisa amazwi eZulu: kunye, kubili, kuthathu, kane, sihlanu, yisithupha, yisikhombisa, yisishiyagalombili, yisishiyagalolunye, yishumi. Siphinde sifundise ukubala izinto ezibonakala: amaqanda, amaphepha, amabhubhu. Siyasebenzisa ukubala izandla ukuze sibale. Siphinde sifundise ukuhlukanisa, ukuhlanganisa, nokuphindaphinda. Izingane zifunda ukubala ngokudlala nemidlalo. Ukubala kuyinto engqele ukuze izingane zikwazi ukufunda ezikoleni.

UKUVIKELA IMVELO: UKUFUNDISA IZINGANE NGOKUSEBENZISANA NEMVELO

Ukuvikela imvelo kubalulekile empilweni yethu. Kufanele sifundise izingane ukuthi zingaphephi ibanga kanye namanzi. Amanzi abalulekile ekuphileni futhi kufanele awasebenziselwe izinto ezifanele kuphela. Kufanele singalahi udoti emfuleni noma emthombo. Izingane zifuneka zitshale imihlahla nezimbali. Ukutshala kuza kusiza ukuze kube nemvula. Izingane zifuneka zifunde ukungalimi izilwane zeganga. Kufanele siphinde sifunde ukuthi singahlobi amahlathi. Lezi zinto zizosiza emvelweni yethu ukuze iqhubeke nokusiza nezizukulwane ezizayo.

ISIFUNDO SOKUSEBENZISA ITHEKNOLOJI KUBADALA

Itheknoloji iyinto entsha emiphakathini kodwa ibalulekile. Sifundisa abantu abadala ukuthi basebenzise amafoni ahlakaniphile. Okuqala, kufanele bafunde ukuthi bavule noma bavale ifoni. Okulandelayo, bafunde ukuthi bathumele noma bathole imiyalezo. Kufanele bafunde ukushayela, ukubuka imisakazo, kanye nokubhala izincwadi. Sikwafundisa ukuthi basebenzise i-WhatsApp, imisakazo, kanye nento ye-Internet. Lezi zinto zizoba usizo ekuxhumaniseni nabomndeni kanye nabangane. Itheknoloji izoba ngcono uma isebenziselwa ukufundisa, ukuthumela izincwadi, kanye nokuthenga izinto.
